title: IFeature.IGetChildren
description: Gets the child features belonging to this feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of features VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
This method gets the direct children of this feature. It does not get children of children.
To determine the size of the array, call
IFeature::IGetChildCount
before calling this method.
